thread.title: Samsung Galaxy Note5 starts receiving Android Nougat update in India
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy Note5 starts receiving Android Nougat update in India

title: Samsung Galaxy Note5 starts receiving Android Nougat update in India
text:
Samsung Galaxy Note5 starts receiving Android Nougat update in India Samsung Galaxy Note5 starts receiving Android Nougat update in India By March 30, 2017 “The update brings improved UX, performance enhancements and more” 
A couple weeks ago, Samsung started rolling out the Android Nougat update to the Galaxy Note5 in Turkey. Now the Indian units of the phone have also been getting the same update. The update brings the new firmware version “ N920GDDU3CQC7 ”, and is being rolled out over the air. Since it’s a major software update, it weighs a little over 1,000MB. 
As per the official change log, the Nougat update for the Galaxy Note5 brings new UX and various performance improvements. It comes with improved usability of the Notification panel and Quick Settings button. The update also features a better multi-window experience, Samsung Pass, improved speed of system upgrade and app installation. If you’ve already received the update, let us know your experience of Nougat on your Note5 in the comments below.
